options.content:
The metrics for this dashboard are collected directly from the cgroupfs.

Executable snippet (extracted from [metrics.sh](https://github.tools.sap/kubernetes/connectivity-monitor/blob/master/connectivity-exporter/metrics.sh)):

```shell
cd /sys/fs/cgroup || exit 1
awk '$1 !~ /^total/ {printf "memory_stat_%s{} %s\n", $1, $2}' \
  memory/memory.stat
```

Example output:

```prometheus
memory_stat_cache{} 14204928
memory_stat_rss{} 21487616
memory_stat_rss_huge{} 18874368
memory_stat_shmem{} 0
memory_stat_mapped_file{} 8650752
memory_stat_dirty{} 0
memory_stat_writeback{} 0
memory_stat_swap{} 0
memory_stat_pgpgin{} 544731
memory_stat_pgpgout{} 540592
memory_stat_pgfault{} 1268322
memory_stat_pgmajfault{} 0
memory_stat_inactive_anon{} 0
memory_stat_active_anon{} 21479424
memory_stat_inactive_file{} 14057472
memory_stat_active_file{} 405504
memory_stat_unevictable{} 0
memory_stat_hierarchical_memory_limit{} 524288000
memory_stat_hierarchical_memsw_limit{} 524288000
```

The memory.stat metrics in the pseudo file `/sys/fs/cgroup/memory/memory.stat` are documented in https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/memory.txt

```
# per-memory cgroup local status
cache         - # of bytes of page cache memory
rss           - # of bytes of anonymous and swap cache memory (includes transparent hugepages)
rss_huge      - # of bytes of anonymous transparent hugepages
mapped_file   - # of bytes of mapped file (includes tmpfs/shmem)
pgpgin        - # of charging events to the memory cgroup. The charging
                  event happens each time a page is accounted as either mapped
                  anon page(RSS) or cache page(Page Cache) to the cgroup
pgpgout       - # of uncharging events to the memory cgroup. The uncharging
                  event happens each time a page is unaccounted from the cgroup
swap          - # of bytes of swap usage
dirty         - # of bytes that are waiting to get written back to the disk
writeback     - # of bytes of file/anon cache that are queued for syncing to disk
inactive_anon - # of bytes of anonymous and swap cache memory on inactive LRU list
active_anon   - # of bytes of anonymous and swap cache memory on active LRU list
inactive_file - # of bytes of file-backed memory on inactive LRU list
active_file   - # of bytes of file-backed memory on active LRU list
unevictable   - # of bytes of memory that cannot be reclaimed (mlocked etc)
```

```
# status considering hierarchy (see memory.use_hierarchy settings)

hierarchical_memory_limit - # of bytes of memory limit with regard to hierarchy
                              under which the memory cgroup is
hierarchical_memsw_limit  - # of bytes of memory+swap limit with regard to
                              hierarchy under which memory cgroup is
```

panels.title: Metrics
bytes
events
Readme
Cache RSS mapped_file unevictable shmem
cache - # of bytes of page cache memory
mapped_file   - # of bytes of mapped file (includes tmpfs/shmem)
rss           - # of bytes of anonymous and swap cache memory (includes transparent hugepages)
rss_huge      - # of bytes of anonymous transparent hugepages
unevictable   - # of bytes of memory that cannot be reclaimed (mlocked etc)
Shmem
File / Anon
active_anon   - # of bytes of anonymous and swap cache memory on active LRU list
inactive_anon - # of bytes of anonymous and swap cache memory on inactive LRU list
active_file   - # of bytes of file-backed memory on active LRU list
inactive_file - # of bytes of file-backed memory on inactive LRU list
writeback     - # of bytes of file/anon cache that are queued for syncing to disk
dirty         - # of bytes that are waiting to get written back to the disk
Events
pgpgin        - rate of charging events to the memory cgroup
pgpgout - rate of uncharging events to the memory cgroup
Page fault
Major Page fault
swap          - # of bytes of swap usage
Swap
hierarchical_memory_limit - # of bytes of memory limit
hierarchical_memsw_limit  - # of bytes of memory+swap limit
Limits
